metadata.Title: CVE-2023-49735 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: ** UNSUPPORTED WHEN ASSIGNED ** The value set as theDefaultLocaleResolver.LOCALE_KEY attribute on the session was not validatedwhile resolving XML definition files, leading to possible path traversaland eventually SSRF/XXE when passing user-controlled data to this key.Passing user-controlled data to this key may be relatively common, as itwas also used like that to set the language in the 'tiles-test' applicationshipped with Tiles. This issue affects Apache Tiles from version 2 onwards.NOTE: This vulnerability only affects products that are no longer supportedby the maintainer.

criterions.comment: tiles package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
